name: Agency Authorization Status
title: AGAUTH
definition: Indicates that a customer is acting as another customer's agent.
usageNotes: Required when the customer is acting as a   customer agent otherwise optional.
fieldNotes: If this is a new authorization the customer must   provide a copy of the written authorization to the   provider.
Consult with the provider to determine local policy   of agency authorization requirements for the billing   of end users when ordered by the customer.
